about_the_game:
Get equipped with Nanite Systems’ most popular weapons at a great discount!

The PlanetSide 2 First Recruit Bundle contains:
  • One 1-Day Experience Boost – Make the most of your kills!
  • NS-11C
  • NS-44 Commissioner – A great side arm for close combat kills!
  • Indar Dry Brush Camo – Perfect for blending into the desert environment of the Indar continent!
detailed_description:
Get equipped with Nanite Systems’ most popular weapons at a great discount!

The PlanetSide 2 First Recruit Bundle contains:
  • One 1-Day Experience Boost – Make the most of your kills!
  • NS-11C
  • NS-44 Commissioner – A great side arm for close combat kills!
  • Indar Dry Brush Camo – Perfect for blending into the desert environment of the Indar continent!
legal_notice: © 2015 Daybreak Game Company, LLC . Daybreak Game Company, the Daybreak Games logo and PlanetSide are registered trademarks of Daybreak Game Company LLC in the United States and/or other countries. All rights reserved.
name: Planetside 2: First Recruit Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6850 or higher / AMD Phenom II X2 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600 series or higher / AMD or ATI 4850 series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 processor or higher / AMD Phenom II X6 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 540 or higher / AMD HD 6870 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card

short_description: Get equipped with Nanite Systems’ most popular weapons at a great discount!
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
